entry.title: Emlog dataphp Background SQL Injection Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php Background SQL Injection Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-39121

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Emlog是一个开源博客系统。此漏洞存在于数据备份/恢复功能中，由于输入验证不当，攻击者可以通过特制的备份文件执行任意SQL语句。

产品厂商： Emlog

产品名称： Emlog

影响版本： 2.1.9

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/7dc653ab2ca56f7652900a83108527a192cdb11e/emlog%2FCVE-2023-39121%2FREADME.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

Emlog data.php Background SQL Injection Vulnerability (CVE-2023-39121)

Emlog is an open-source blog system. This vulnerability exists in the data backup/restore functionality where improper input validation allows attackers to execute arbitrary SQL statements through specially crafted backup files.

Reference Links:

  • https://github.com/safe-b/CVE/issues/1#issue-1817133689
  • https://www.emlog.net/docs/install/install_docker/
  • https://hub.docker.com/layers/emlog/emlog/pro-latest-php7.4-apache/images/sha256-55bcc4861e1cc99ad79505be05ca3f3e5d9bb5dd16b8f2edc6ae62f7315cb8df

Vulnerability Environment

Execute the following command to start an Emlog 2.1.9 server:

After the environment starts, accessing http://your-ip/install.php will redirect to the installation page. Register a username and password, then complete the installation. After completion, log in to the admin management interface.

Exploit Steps

  1. Click: System → Data → Start Backup

  2. A SQL file will be downloaded

  3. Open the SQL file and add a malicious SQL statement (example: inserting a new user)

  4. Import the modified SQL file

  5. A new user appears, confirming successful SQL injection
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php Background SQL Injection

entry.title: Emlog dataphp 后台SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php 后台SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-39121

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Emlog 2.1.9版本中的data.php文件存在SQL注入漏洞，攻击者可以利用该漏洞在后台执行任意SQL命令，可能导致数据泄露或其他恶意操作。

产品厂商： Emlog

产品名称： Emlog

影响版本： 2.1.9

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/7dc653ab2ca56f7652900a83108527a192cdb11e/emlog%2FCVE-2023-39121%2Fdocker-compose.yml

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php 后台SQL注入漏洞

entry.title: Emlog dataphp 后台SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php 后台SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-39121

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Emlog 是一款开源博客系统。该漏洞存在于数据备份/恢复功能中，由于输入验证不充分，攻击者可通过特制的备份文件执行任意 SQL 语句。

产品厂商： Emlog

产品名称： Emlog

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/7dc653ab2ca56f7652900a83108527a192cdb11e/emlog%2FCVE-2023-39121%2FREADME.zh-cn.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

Emlog data.php 后台SQL注入漏洞（CVE-2023-39121）

Emlog 是一款开源博客系统。该漏洞存在于数据备份/恢复功能中，由于输入验证不充分，攻击者可通过特制的备份文件执行任意 SQL 语句。

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/safe-b/CVE/issues/1#issue-1817133689
  • https://www.emlog.net/docs/install/install_docker/
  • https://hub.docker.com/layers/emlog/emlog/pro-latest-php7.4-apache/images/sha256-55bcc4861e1cc99ad79505be05ca3f3e5d9bb5dd16b8f2edc6ae62f7315cb8df

漏洞环境

执行如下命令启动一个emlog2.1.9版本服务器：

环境启动后，访问http://your-ip/install.php会跳转到安装页面。注册一个用户名、密码，然后安装。完成之后，登录后台管理界面：

漏洞利用

  1. 点击系统->数据->开始备份

  2. 发现下载了一个sql文件

  3. 打开sql文件，添加一条sql语句（插入一个用户为例）

  4. 将刚才修改的sql文件导入

  5. 发现新增了一个用户，说明sql注入成功
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Emlog data.php 后台SQL注入漏洞

entry.title: D-Link Network Attached Storage 硬编码凭证漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： D-Link Network Attached Storage 硬编码凭证漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-3272

漏洞类型： 硬编码凭证

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 在D-Link DNS-320L、DNS-325、DNS-327L和DNS-340L中，发现了一个非常严重的漏洞，影响到了文件/cgi-bin/nas_sharing.cgi的HTTP GET请求处理器的某些未知处理。通过使用参数user和输入messagebus的操作，导致了硬编码凭证的问题。

产品厂商： dlink

产品名称： D-Link DNS-320L, DNS-325, DNS-327L, DNS-340L

影响版本： up to 20240403

搜索语法： app=”D_Link-DNS-ShareCenter”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/6ccf2e79fc206d19400a9bdc7eaf796cd0553a90/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-3272.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: vRealize Log Insight 目录遍历漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： vRealize Log Insight 目录遍历漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2022-31706

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： vRealize Log Insight 存在一个由于验证不足导致的目录遍历漏洞，允许未经认证的攻击者向操作系统中注入文件，且利用此漏洞无需认证。

产品厂商： VMware

产品名称： vRealize Log Insight

搜索语法： http.title:”vrealize log insight”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12432

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

vRealize Log Insight contains a directory traversal caused by insufficient validation, letting unauthenticated attackers inject files into the operating system, exploit requires no authentication.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/ddb06c8c45d9
  • https///github.com:horizon3ai/vRealizeLogInsightRCE.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"vrealize log insight"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： vRealize Log Insight 目录遍历漏洞

entry.title: Pulse Connect Secure 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2021-22893

漏洞类型： 目录遍历

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Pulse Connect Secure 9.1R11.4及以下版本存在未认证的远程代码执行漏洞。攻击者可以利用路径遍历漏洞写入任意文件，通过上传webshell导致远程代码执行。此漏洞允许攻击者在Linux系统上执行数学计算以验证RCE，在Windows系统上执行netstat -an命令，并通过特定的正则表达式模式验证结果。

产品厂商： ivanti

产品名称： connect_secure

影响版本： <= 9.1R11.4

搜索语法： http.html:”welcome.cgi?p=logo” OR http.title:”ivanti connect secure” OR body=”welcome.cgi?p=logo” OR title=”ivanti connect secure” OR intitle:”ivanti connect secure”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/6f824c6ceedb93792a23af37f798c7c4c26d3892/http%2Fcves%2F2021%2FCVE-2021-22893.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Pulse Connect Secure 远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: IBM MQ SSL Bypass Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： IBM MQ SSL Bypass Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-36041

漏洞类型： 权限绕过

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-36041是IBM MQ（消息队列）中的一个漏洞，允许通过注入伪造的SSL证书和使用定制的MQCONNX参数绕过SSL证书验证，从而建立未经授权的客户端连接到IBM MQ服务器。

产品厂商： IBM

产品名称： IBM MQ

来源： https://github.com/byteReaper77/CVE-2025-36041

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • exploit.c

来源概述

CVE-2025-36041 IBM MQ SSL Bypass Exploit

Overview

This repository contains a proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit for CVE-2025-36041, a vulnerability in IBM MQ (Message Queue) that allows bypassing SSL certificate validation. By injecting a fake SSL certificate and using customized MQCONNX parameters, an unauthorized client connection to an IBM MQ server can be established.

Features

  • SSL Bypass: Injects a fake SSL KeyRepository to disable server certificate validation.
  • Automated Exploit: Opens a specified queue and sends a test message ("Hello MQ") to confirm successful exploitation.
  • Customizable: Specify the target queue manager, queue name, and path to the fake SSL repository via command-line arguments.

Prerequisites

  • IBM MQ Client SDK (headers and libraries)
  • argparse.h (for command-line parsing)
  • GCC (or compatible C compiler)

Ensure IBM MQ client libraries are installed and environment variables (MQ_INCLUDE_PATH, MQ_LIB_PATH) are set accordingly.

Building

gcc exploit.c argparse.c -o CVE-2025-36041
-I/path/to/mqm/include
-L/path/to/mqm/lib -lmqm

Usage

./CVE-2025-36041
-p /path/to/fake/ssl
-n TARGET.QUEUE.NAME
-m QM1

Parameters:

  • -p, --path    Path to the fake SSL KeyRepository directory.
  • -n, --name    Target queue name to open and send message.
  • -m, --qmgr    Queue Manager name.

Example

./CVE-2025-36041 -p ./fake_ssl_repo -n MY.QUEUE -m QM1

If successful, you will see:

[+] Starting connection to IBM MQ…
[+] Connected successfully with fake SSL!
[+] Message sent successfully!

Disclaimer

For authorized penetration testing and educational purposes only.
Unauthorized use of this PoC may violate local laws and regulations. The author assumes no liability for misuse.

Author: Byte Reaper
CVE: CVE-2025-36041
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： IBM MQ SSL Bypass Vulnerability

entry.title: Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

entry.title: Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-0604

漏洞类型： 远程代码执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft SharePoint 存在一个远程代码执行漏洞，原因是未能检查应用程序包的源标记，允许远程攻击者通过发送恶意的应用程序包执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： SharePoint

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:sharepoint_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12340

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft SharePoint contains a remote code execution caused by failure to check the source markup of an application package, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires sending malicious application package.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/davidlebr1/cve-2019-0604-SP2010-netv3.5
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b321302986c1
  • https://github.com/Gh0st0ne/weaponized-0604
  • https///github.com:Gh0st0ne/weaponized-0604.git
  • https://github.com/boxhg/CVE-2019-0604
  • https://github.com/m5050/CVE-2019-0604
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/cca6def6980c
  • https://github.com/k8gege/CVE-2019-0604
  • https///github.com:k8gege/CVE-2019-0604.git
  • https://github.com/likekabin/CVE-2019-0604_sharepoint_CVE
  • https://github.com/linhlhq/CVE-2019-0604

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:sharepoint_server"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SharePoint 远程代码执行漏洞

entry.title: Pterodactyl Panel Allows Unauthenticated Arbitrary Remote Code Execution
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-24wv-6c99-f843

仓库 Star： 7708

CVSS 评分： 10.0

参考链接：

  • https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel/security/advisories/GHSA-24wv-6c99-f843

  • https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel/commit/24c82b0e335fb5d7a844226b08abf9f176e592f0

  • https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel/releases/tag/v1.11.11

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-24wv-6c99-f843

描述：

Impact

Using the /locales/locale.json with the locale and namespace query parameters, a malicious actor is able to execute arbitrary code, without being authenticated.

With the ability to execute arbitrary code, this vulnerability can be exploited in an infinite number of ways. It could be used to gain access to the Panel’s server, read credentials from the Panel’s config (.env or otherwise), extract sensitive information from the database (such as user details [username, email, first and last name, hashed password, ip addresses, etc]), access files of servers managed by the panel, etc.

Patches

This vulnerability was patched by https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel/commit/24c82b0e335fb5d7a844226b08abf9f176e592f0 and was released under the v1.11.11 tag without any other code modifications compared to v1.11.10.

For those who need to patch their installations in-place or apply it on top of other code modifications, a patch file can be retrieved from https://github.com/pterodactyl/panel/commit/24c82b0e335fb5d7a844226b08abf9f176e592f0.patch and applied using git apply.

Workarounds

Other than patching the software, there is no workaround in this software. Disabling the /locales/locale.json endpoint at the webserver level is possible, but would break the localization feature wherever it is used.

The only other workaround relies on an external Web Application Firewall (WAF), such as Cloudflare’s WAF with their default ruleset (requires Pro plan or above, Free doesn’t have the proper ruleset) to mitigate this attack.

Updating to v1.11.11 or manually patching the software are the only recommended ways to completely mitigate this vulnerability.

User Notice

Shortly after the v1.11.11release and it’s announcement, security researchers and malicious actors have been attempting to exploit this vulnerability. While there hasn’t been any official confirmations of breaches or successful exploits of the vulnerability in the wild, it is only a matter of time for those who remain on unpatched versions without any workarounds in place.

The scope of this vulnerability cannot be fully described, anything is possible. It is of utmost importance that anyone running a vulnerable version of this software, patch it or update to the latest available version immediately.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-24wv-6c99-f843

entry.title: CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious URL File and WebDAV
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过生成恶意的.URL文件来利用CVE-2025-33053，该文件指向一个受信任的LOLBAS二进制文件，其参数设计用于触发意外行为。可选地，生成一个有效载荷并将其托管在指定的WebDAV目录上。当受害者打开快捷方式时，它将尝试访问WebDAV路径，可能通过受信任的二进制文件导致远程代码执行。

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/dd51952b67d956cb40350329ff7e3a2d4ad3c7bd/modules%2Fexploits%2Fwindows%2Ffileformat%2Fcve_2025_33053.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情

entry.title: D-Link Network Attached Storage 后门账户漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： D-Link Network Attached Storage 后门账户漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-3272

漏洞类型： 硬编码凭证

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： 在D-Link DNS-320L、DNS-325、DNS-327L和DNS-340L中发现了一个被分类为非常严重的漏洞，影响日期截至20240403。此问题影响了组件HTTP GET请求处理程序的文件/cgi-bin/nas_sharing.cgi的某些未知处理。使用输入messagebus对参数user的操作导致了硬编码凭证的问题。

产品厂商： dlink

产品名称： D-Link DNS-320L, DNS-325, DNS-327L, DNS-340L

影响版本： up to 20240403
